refnamediv.refpurpose: Resolve the realpath of a provided path string

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Translates filename into the effective real path on the remote filesystem.

example.title: Resolving a pathname
example.programlisting:
<?php
$connection = ssh2_connect('shell.example.com', 22);
ssh2_auth_password($connection, 'username', 'password');
$sftp = ssh2_sftp($connection);

$realpath = ssh2_sftp_realpath($sftp, '/home/username/../../../..//./usr/../etc/passwd');
/* $realpath is now: '/etc/passwd' */
?>

refsect1.simpara: See Also: realpath, and ssh2_sftp_symlink ssh2_sftp_readlink
